amendment.description: An amendment numbered 46 printed in the Congressional Record to permit the Secretary to delay drawdown if the drawdown will harm national security.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to permit the Secretary to delay drawdown if the drawdown will harm national security.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson (NC) amendment (A071) Failed by recorded vote: 210 - 220 (Roll no. 90).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A071) offered by Mr. Jackson (NC).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson (NC) amendment (A071) Failed by recorded vote: 210 - 220 (Roll no. 90).
